synopsis
Five medical students decide to experiment on themselves what lies beyond death. For this cause the stoppage of the heart and brain of each of them until the monitors that show vital signs indicate a horizontal line. In that instant come to the resuscitation of the body. Following the success of the first experience, decide to stay more time in that state.
